derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Latin tubus 'tube' + curare + -ine

means.word_mean: 1. a toxic alkaloid found in certain tropical South American trees that is a powerful relaxant for striated muscles; used by South American indians as an arrow poison;

sentences.sentence: "curare acts by blocking cholinergic transmission at the myoneural junction"
